video.title: Art of Flight: The Series
video.synopsis: This documentary series follows professional snowboarder Travis Rice and director Curt Morgan as they risk it all to make the film of their dreams.

episodes.synopsis: After stress at the border, the team arrives in Canada only to find bad weather, high avalanche danger and risky helicopter situations.
episodes.title: A Rough Start

episodes.synopsis: With production behind and the snow melting, Curt and Travis have no choice but to head to Alaska in an expensive last-ditch effort.
episodes.title: Go North!

episodes.synopsis: Pressure increases as time passes for the crew, who are still deep in the Alaskan Tordrillo mountain range, far from civilization.
episodes.title: Off to See the Wizard

episodes.synopsis: Although Alaska ended well, it didn't get the production back on track. The only choice for Travis and Curt is to chase winter to Chile.
episodes.title: Chasing Winter

episodes.synopsis: After devastating earthquakes and a volcanic eruption, the crew and riders find themselves stranded in Chile, unsure of what to do next.
episodes.title: The New Pioneers

episodes.synopsis: Travis and Curt invite pro snowboarders Scotty Lago, Mark Landvik, Bjorn Leines, John Jackson and Pat Moore to explore the Wyoming backcountry.
episodes.title: There's No Place Like Home

episodes.synopsis: This is the last shoot, and with nothing to lose and everything to gain, Curt and Travis decide to move production to Aspen, Colo.
episodes.title: Going All In
